attributes.action: ban extreme Christian groups from being active in the UK, that preach hatred like the Westboro baptist in America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Extreme religious groups of all demoninations can create hate mongering and should be restricted in their activities when they can brainwash people, vulnerable people especially children into not only a negative frame of mind but being hateful towards minority groups.
